title: Kaijin of the Vanishing Touch

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Generate (Blue) each night.
- (1) Defend target player, redirecting all attackers against them to yourself. Whenever you redirect an attack, the attacker will become unable to talk, vote, or use abilities for the following day phase.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You are unable to use the factional attack until you are the last living Gatherer.

desc:
Post 1895
*When it’s finished, all that’s left of you is a ripple on a still pond.*
